pr_title: Reject sparql-update as rdf for object creation.

timeline.message: Reject sparql-update as rdf for object creation.

timeline.body:
For reference, this test was added back in [August 2014](https://github.com/fcrepo4/fcrepo4/commit/db1180e899c3ad9bbb65dc2f226c86b1417df7d1) related to this [PivotalTracker ticket](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/n/projects/684825/stories/77492702).

Seems it is disabled by default and so has not been run possibly ever.
